# Token Reference Table

This table lists all tokens for this component:

| Token | Description |
|-------|------------|
| inputgroup-addon.width | Controls how wide the currency symbol appears in currency input fields (like the '$' symbol that appears inside the input box). This determines the space reserved for the currency symbol.<br>CSS variable: --wm-currency-inputgroup-addon-width |
| inputgroup-addon.font-family | Sets the typeface (font style) for currency symbols in input fields. This determines whether the currency symbol appears in Arial, Times New Roman, or other font styles.<br>CSS variable: --wm-currency-inputgroup-addon-font-family |
| inputgroup-addon.font-size | Controls how large the currency symbol appears in input fields. This affects the size of the '$', 'â‚¬', or other currency symbols that users see inside the input box.<br>CSS variable: --wm-currency-inputgroup-addon-font-size |
| inputgroup-addon.font-weight | Controls how thick or bold the currency symbol appears in input fields. 'normal' makes it regular weight, 'bold' makes it thicker, and numbers (100-900) provide fine control over thickness.<br>CSS variable: --wm-currency-inputgroup-addon-font-weight |
| inputgroup-addon.line-height | Controls the vertical spacing around currency symbols in input fields. This ensures the symbol is properly centered within the input field.<br>CSS variable: --wm-currency-inputgroup-addon-line-height |
| inputgroup-addon.letter-spacing | Controls the horizontal spacing around currency symbols in input fields. This can help make the symbol more readable and properly spaced.<br>CSS variable: --wm-currency-inputgroup-addon-letter-spacing |
